Room.Name: Ogre's Play Pen
Room.ShortDescription: You have entered Ogre's fighting area for barbarians and fighters.
Room.LongDescription: Ogre's Play Pen appears to be a rather old but well kept building of stone and brick. Many years have passed since the days of the legendary adventures of the two Brownhaven heros, Ogre the barbarian and his comrade in arms, the wise cleric Lorinin. Now the tales of Ogre are mostly unknown. In his retirement, Ogre used his fortune to build a place for barbarians and fighters to play and practice. To the north, you see a sign for "Bashing Unlimited" and to the south another sign saying "Arena".
